Description.Name: Haru Nakamura
Description.Details: Haru Nakamura, callsign "Hipfire", a seasoned 33-year-old MechWarrior with a storied past as an ex-pirate. Once part of a pirate organisation "The Bloody Hands", he has since turned his back on his criminal roots, seeking redemption and a new path on the battlefield. Renowned for his lethal accuracy and lightning-fast reflexes, "Hipfire" specializes in weapons systems, delivering precise and devastating barrages upon his enemies.
